title: Makes sense...
body: Its not like there isn't any possible way for Voidlings to get true damage or anything aye.

replies.body: "RIOT's issues", I've seen everyone of your posts its starting to become annoying THEY already know the death recap is bugged and broken they have tried to fix it so don't rely on it and clearly it didn't do true damage. How about you use your normal account to post on here what happened to it, did it get banned, are you scared that people will hate on you so you make a new account.

If my posts are getting annoying then they are obviously hitting home.
But if you are frustrated then don't look at them, simple solution.

Now i take issue with 'don't rely on death recap' the death recap is there to inform you of how much damage was dealt to you, what kind of damage it was and where it came from, now i don't know about you but thats an awful lot of important information that can affect your playstyle and build.

if items didnt show the correct stats when you bought them would you be happy? no. so why should you be happy with seeing incorrect stats about how much damage those items did to you?

Riot manages to fix other less important issues, i see no reason to hold out on fixing this one, and i will remind them each time it happens.

as for my real account, the reason i don't post on it is because i have spent a lot of money on it, and the more places you put in your username and password (i.e. the boards) the more likely your account is to be caught up in a mass hacking event (like the kind that happened a year or so ago)
so for the small sake of using an account a friend and i made, i reduce the potential risk to my proper account, its that simple. 

I have never been chat banned or account banned or had any other kind of punishment except the occasional dodge penalty, (and i hope to keep it that way), i speak my mind on the boards as i do in real life. I never directly insult or put down anyone, i may be condescending and arrogant but I'm hardly ever toxic.  I do sometimes raise sensitive issues, and if people like yourself happen to find offence in said issues then they are welcome to argue their view, but its never personal, and i am within my right to raise them.
This is like the third one you've done today you don't seem to like a lot of the damage some champs do hey?
I dont mind the damage, i just don't like when it tells me the wrong things.
Well the death overview has been broken for a while

so i like reminding them that if they want to keep standing by their policy of 'clarity' then they need to apply it to ALL walks of life, and not just the ones that suit them :P
